data.text: Eliyu kpɔɛi zeɠeni ʋolu, é ɠɛ ma:
«Ɠima nuiti, à woilo gòoiti ma!
Mazɔlɔɔ nu woiyeɠei ɠa ɗa wooiti zɔɠɔzuɠa,
Fai sɔlegai, de naa yeeɠaaɠwɛ lɛɛ da ɓɔɠɔi.
«Wɛlɛ nii Zɔɓe ɠisiɛzu su:
Anɛɛ tèlebogɛ, gè levea ga zɛɛ nu.
«Nu ɠa ná nɛi nii kulaai ga Zɔɓe,
ta faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ka ti siɛpolui zu,
Mazɔlɔɔ tɔ ɓɔɠɔi boni, é ɠɛ ma: ‹Toɠa ga wafuun faa
«Wɔi ɠi pagɔi wo ma, à woilo gòoi ma!
Mazɔlɔɔ toɠa ɗa nui ɠilagilagi zala é zoloo ná-kɛɛwotiiti ma,
Gaamai zu, koleʋɛ ga GALA ge la ɗa ga faaɠaaza kɛa,
Taɠili ka ná, bɔɔlɔai, é eteai ma masadai vea GALA zea ɓaa?
Ni GALA ge ɠɛni ɠigaiziɛzu ɓɔɠɔ nɔ zu,
kpɛtɛaniiti pɛ undaa ɠa ʋili ʋɔɔma,
«Ni è ɠeleɠelegɛ, woilo dɛɛ nii ma,
GALA ka zoo nɛi, é zei eteai unda ɓaa, ni é la wɔinni ga sɔledai?
Ɗa zoo è ɠɛ masagi ma: ‹Nu ɲakai,›
GALA ge la ɗa ga loga kundiɠia ʋolu yɛ,
Gaamago nɔ, saai ʋaa, kua zaamai,
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ka wɛlɛzu nuiti siɛ ʋeleiti ba,
Ma ɓidii la ná, ɓaa kpidi ɓɔii,
«Ungo, GALA kpɛdɛ la ba ga é lɛbi nui zumɔsu ɠeke, é ʋa leɠa tukpɔ.
Toɠa ɗa zobobɛ nuiti koloɠolo, kpɛdɛ la ba ga é faa wuuɓɛ naazu,
Mazɔlɔɔ é ta-ɠɛɛwotiiti zɔɠɔzuɠwɛɛ.
Toɠa ɗa ti loɠa kɛlɛzu eɠɛ nu ʋaa nua.
Ti ʋoluavega tɔun ba,
Mazɔlɔɔ ti yɛga su, bala nuiti kpain gooi lɛa naa ʋɔ bɛ,
«Zenɔ ɠana é la, ni GALA ka maaɠɛna kpɔ, ɓɛ ɠa a peelala?
nii a kɛ telebotala nui mina masada ɠɛ,
«Tanisu nui ɠa nii wo GALA ma ga:
Nii gè la dɛ kaani, ɗɔun naa lɛɛlɛ ga ze.
GALA maanɛɛʋɛ é sala?
«Gi zoloogɛ ma gá ɠi pagɔ nuiti, ta ɓɔga ɠima nui, niiti ti woilosu gòoi ma:
‹Zɔɓe ɠa ɓɔɛzu, é la gaaɠaazu,
Ná-ʋoluɠulai maanɛɛʋɛ é zeeli kwɛgi ma,
Toɠa kpakagi ɓɔsu ná-faaɠaazagi ʋa,
